author: rafaellopesdesa
body:
Description:

   * This is a backport https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/18106
   * Please, refer to the link above for more in-depth description of the PR. In few words, it is used for ECAL PF cluster studies and calibration.
   * Recalibration will be necessary following the modifications as a result of #18016 .

@perrotta @slava77 Related to the discussion we had in #18106 , I checked the location of the new dictionaries. It doesn't complain of this PR, but it does complain about:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blame/CMSSW_9_0_X/SimTracker/TrackTriggerAssociation/src/classes.h

(and associated xml file) in 90X. I think it is related to #15949 . Should I do anything about it?
title: Pf cluster truth selector 90X
